short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that fix whatsapp sidebar by putting a button and hide the chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension fixes the WhatsApp Web sidebar by hiding all conversations with a click of the chat button. Perfect for when you're sharing your screen and want to keep your chats private.
